description:
New Generation Intelligent Collaborative Cloud Service

Cloud Hub is a new generation intelligent collaborative cloud service for enterprises aimed at replacing traditional applications such as OA, portal, approval and attendance, and fully adapted to Chinese information technology application innovation ecology. According to IDC's data, Cloud Hub has maintained its position as the market leader in China's enterprise collaborative SaaS market for five consecutive years. Typical customers include top enterprises from various industries such as China South Industries Group Corporation, HBIS Group, OPPO, Country Garden and HMN Tech, as well as medium and large enterprises and specialized innovative enterprises like Intellifusion, Chu's Agriculture and Hunan Lihe.
source: 深圳云之家网络有限公司
